name: The Jack of Hearts
description:
Do you like really mediocre games that are free? Well, this is an essential. We have bad pixel art, bad gameplay, and no story to talk of, but we do have some nice fonts.

The game's story is of the Jack of Hearts, protecting the King of Hearts from the other suits. There are 3 modes, and 4 difficulties to try, with new enemies as you get more intense. There is also a semi-working leaderboard system, but don't count on it.

Thank you for checking this out.
